Ragnar drew a grin on his face.

Ragnar: Seyla, then! First, we need to know what group possesses which 
ressources. I think that some energy-producing materials would be a 
good idea. We might as well build around and bring in some laborers 
around to establish a foothold here. As for the trial itself, I think 
the three of us can handle it, quiaff?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <silvanna2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "ok" said the male "it's fine for me"
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Ragnar: Yes, I suppose we could do that first. After, what if we 
> try 
> > to acquire some ressources from another group?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > ::Aerotaur::
> > >        He shrugs noncommittally.  "I would rather be out 
> performing 
> > a 
> > > function.  But I suppose food is a necessity."  With that he 
> > gestures for 
> > > Windlord to lead the way with a quick wave of his hand toward 
the 
> > hallway.
